item.title: Safari overflow
item.description: Motivation I encountered this situation where Safari’s display would overflow when the keyboard shows up. This ruins the whole page even when the elements have a width of 100% and body has and overflow-x hidden set. Solution In head, add a meta tag for viewport like meta name="viewport” content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=0"> width would set the viewport’s width to that of the device’s width. initial-scale makes sure the zoom level is initially set to 1 (100%).
